price: 3. »¿Cuando muramos y seamos polvo (resucitaremos)? ¡Eso está lejos de suceder!».
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
